terminologie_extrait.contexte: receiving a serve and pushing it back with spin

quick_chip_receive.probleme: Opponent serves short backspin or no-spin to middle or backhand, and all you can do is push it back

debutant.probleme: Take the serve right off the bounce and aim wide to the server's backhand

exercices_complementaires.description: Hit the serve with a slightly downward stroke, aiming for the wide backhand corner, and give it good backspin. Make sure to place it consistently.

metriques_progression: Placement and consistency are more important than speed.

erreurs_a_eviter.probleme: Let the server's forehand attack get in play
